But several times these Circumcellions, fully armed, beset the roads even against Augustine, the servant of God, when, as it chanced‚ he went on request to visit, instruct and exhort the Catholic people, as he frequently did. Now it once hap- pened that although they were out in iull force, they yet failed to capture him. For through the error ol his guide and yet, in fact, by the providence ol God, it happened that the bishop with his companions carne to his destination by a different road, and he learned later that through this error he had escaped their impious hands, and together with all he gave thanks to God, the Deliverer. And they, according to their custom, spared neither laymen nor clergy, as the public records witness.
